section.para: To schedule an Invoice for email delivery, select the "Schedule Invoice for Email Delivery" option. The following screen will appear:
When scheduling an Invoice for email delivery, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Display lists all Invoices available for email delivery. Highlight the Invoice you want to schedule for email delivery using your mouse button.

note.para: Customers are set up to receive email deliveries of information using the Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) tab on the Customer master.

listitem.para: The default address appearing in the "From" field will belong to the user who is currently logged in to the application. This address may be edited or changed. User email addresses are stored with user records at the system level.

If the Customer associated with the selected Invoice has been set up to receive email, then the default email address for that Customer will be automatically pre-populated here. Because this is an editable field, you may change the email address.

If EDI is set up for the Customer, then the default subject line found on the Customer master will be automatically pre-populated here. Because this is an editable field, you may modify the subject line.

If EDI is set up for the Customer, then the default filename found on the Customer master will be automatically pre-populated here. Because this is an editable field, you may modify the filename line. XML tags may be used in this field to dynamically generate filename text. In the example shown in the screenshot above, the filename will include the Document Type (i.e., Invoice) and the Document Number (i.e., Invoice Number).

If EDI is set up for the Customer, then the default email body found on the Customer master will be automatically pre-populated here. This is a scrolling text field with word-wrapping. You may edit the default email body.
